data.quote: I guess when you’re a creative or when you’re an artist, people kind of have to accept the weird things that you do. Because that’s the only way I can get out what I gotta get out. Sometimes I’m here and then the next thing you know I’m gone, and I’m not as invested as you want me to be.
data.author: 6LACK

data.quote: fashion is a form of self-expression and I think it’s most exciting when style reflects a lack of fear — when you can be really bold and adventurous about style.
data.author: Kimbra

data.quote: It’s the Noise, not the Toys
data.author: Harvey Mason Jr.

data.quote: Ease is a greater threat to progress than hardship.
data.author: Denzel Washington

data.quote: I was too fucking vain to be that guy anymore. That whining, desperate, sick, fucking victim.
data.author: Anthony Bourdain

data.quote: If people don't either love or hate your work, you just haven't done very much.
data.author: Tinker Hatfield

data.quote: Trade expectation for appreciation. Trade Achievement for Fulfillment.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: It’s your decisions, not your conditions that shape your life.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: Some people die at 25 and aren't buried until 75.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
data.author: Andy Warhol

data.quote: Being an entrepreneur is like eating glass and staring into the abyss of death.
data.author: Elon Musk
